title: Adaptive Video-based Vehicle Classification Technique for Monitoring Traffic
text: Transportation Research Board > Blurbs > Adaptive Video-based Vehicle Classification Technique for Monitoring Traffic Text Size: Adaptive Video-based Vehicle Classification Technique for Monitoring Traffic http://cdm16007.contentdm.oclc.org/cdm/ref/collection/p267401ccp2/id/12837 173172 Adaptive Video-based Vehicle Classification Technique for Monitoring Traffic The Ohio Department of Transportation has released a report that presents a methodology for extracting two vehicle features, vehicle length and number of axles, in order to classify the vehicles from video as based on the U.S. Federal Highway Administrationâ€™s vehicle classification scheme.   9/14/2015
